resources.string: Press the TOOLS (spanner) key on the Blobbox remote control and then select Support, Diagnostics to find the IP address.
Blobbox Web Console Username. You may leave this empty if you have not configured a username on your Blobbox.
How to access the Blobbox from a local LAN
ERROR: Are you sure you correctly configure the parameters? Is the box available?
Sorry! we are unable to handle this content
ERROR: unexpected operation code - please contact the authors
Blobbox software on %1$s does not support remote play API.
WARNING: IP %1$s is not a Blobbox. Please check IP Adress and Remote access settings on Blobbox.
Failed to communicate with Blobbox at IP address %1$s. Please check IP Address and Remote access settings on Blobbox.
Authentication failure, check login and password for box on %1$s.
